cause.description:
Many children around the world are either sold or brought up into child exploitation. Child Exploitation is the act of neglect through forcing a child to work the sex trade, rape, or other means of abuse.
1. Child Abuse is wrong. Let's stop the fight of innocent children.
cause.mission: Stop the overgrown Exploitation of child abuse through Sexual Exploitation, molestation, and pornography
cause.name: Support the fight against Child sexual exploitation
